mapper.sql: SELECT children.id FROM t_sys_org, t_sys_org as children WHERE t_sys_org.left_num <= children.left_num AND t_sys_org.right_num >= children.left_num and t_sys_org.id=#{ownerOrgId} order by t_sys_org.node_level ASC
mapper.select:
SELECT message.* FROM message
,() AS ownedOrgIds
WHERE 1=1
AND t_sys_org.org_id = ownedOrgIds.id
AND message.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND message.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.title},'%')
AND message.desc LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.desc},'%')
AND message.message_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.messageType},'%')
AND message.reference_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.referenceId},'%')
AND message.notice_date LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.noticeDate},'%')
AND message.noticeStaffId LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.noticeStaffId},'%')

SELECT id, title, `desc`, message_type AS messageType, reference_id AS referenceId, notice_date AS noticeDate, notice_end_user_id as noticeEndUserId FROM message WHERE 1=1
AND message.notice_end_user_id=${userId}
AND message.notice_date > current_timestamp()
AND message.notice_date <= current_timestamp()

SELECT id, title, `desc`, message_type AS messageType, reference_id AS referenceId, notice_date AS noticeDate, notice_end_user_id as noticeEndUserId FROM message WHERE 1=1
AND notice_end_user_id=#{userId}
